participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nervous but caring, Emily has a deep love for animals and a strong sense of responsibility in her job.
participant_1.background: i'm terrified of scorpions. i am employed by the us postal service. i've a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Excited and optimistic, Jake embraces new experiences and is eager to start his family.
participant_2.background: i recently moved to this country. i am expecting triplets in three months. i work at a school. i just moved into my first home.
